lib.net

Class ConnectionHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • lib.net.ConnectionHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ConnectionHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Handles connections at server's side. A new thread running ConnectionHandler is spawned to handle every new connection to the server.
